data_sources.description: Serialized index containing encoded document vectors.

data_variables.name: documents
data_variables.description: List of strings containing document names for semantic search.

data_variables.name: model
data_variables.description: Pre-trained sentence transformer model for embedding sentences.

data_variables.name: encoded_data
data_variables.description: Array of document vector embeddings generated by the model.

data_variables.name: index
data_variables.description: FAISS index for efficient semantic similarity search.

data_variables.name: query
data_variables.description: Input string for performing semantic search.

data_variables.name: results
data_variables.description: Output of the search function containing matched documents.

data_flow.creation_method: Defined as a list in the notebook.
data_flow.flow: Used for creating document embeddings and stored in FAISS index.

data_flow.creation_method: Loaded from Hugging Face's sentence-transformers library.
data_flow.flow: Used to generate embeddings for documents and queries.
Used to populate FAISS index for semantic search.

data_flow.creation_method: Initialized with the FAISS indexing method and populated with document embeddings.
data_flow.flow: Serialized to save state and can be used for performing searches.

data_flow.creation_method: Defined as a string during the search process.
data_flow.flow: Passed to search function to find similar documents.

data_flow.creation_method: Returned from the search function based on the query.
data_flow.flow: Printed output of the search results.

models.hyperparameters: Pre-trained model parameters from Hugging Face.
